Posts.Content: Hi  Got back from the hospital  this afternoon after having fine needle aspiration on 2 cysts and biopsy on the unknown mass in my breast...have to wait 2 weeks for the results. Feeling very sore and pulled about but the Consultant I had was very good.  You find yourself listneing to the key words, 'oh we've at least found it early' meaning you have breast cancer Jane.  They wouldn't say it to me though, I guess I just know. Well I'm prepared to fight again and not allow this C to get me down too much. Hope you didn't mind me sharing this with you.
Posts.Title: Biopsy today - waiting for results again!

Posts.Content: Thanks for this message - yes 'll try to be ass occupied as I can once I'm back for a few hours in school each day.  This does stop me from thinking the worst. I hope your results are good from your biopsy next week - let me know please... Maybe our boat will keep afloat with some good weather ahead! All the best to you  Jane x
Posts.Title: Biopsy today - waiting for results again!

Posts.Content: Thank you Philipa You have such an insight into how it all goes, thank you for sharing it with me. Will keep you posted Much Love and hugs Jane x
Posts.Title: Biopsy today - waiting for results again!

Posts.Content: Hello Helen Thank you for your kind words in the email - yes you're right! I'm getting on with normality as much as I can so it doesn't effect my children too much. Here's hoping... Jane x

Posts.Title: Biopsy today - waiting for results again!

Posts.Content: Hi there Bless you I hope that all goes well for you and that you have some positive news. It is difficult not being busy in your mind when your body needs to recover and doesn't want to do very much...the waiting is the worse part of it all. Happy to chat when you need a chat - anytime. Much love and hugs Jane x
